paper_abstract: A global electrophilicity parameter and the aromaticity of some heterocyclic polyaromatic hydrocarbons were evaluated on the basis of DFT calculations. The substitution of carbon atoms by nitrogen atoms dramatically changes the global electrophilicity of the molecules, with the fully substituted molecule being the most electrophilic with a reactivity very close to that of fullerene.
paper_title: Aromaticity and electronic properties of Heterosuperbenzene (Heterohexabenzocoronene)
